The photo evidence: The expert's verdict mentions that Joe Biden was photographed kneeling during an Oct. 5 campaign stop in Miami. This photo serves as evidence to verify the claim.
Confirmation from journalists: Two journalists present at the event confirmed that the national anthem was not playing at the time Biden was kneeling. This confirmation adds credibility to the claim's authenticity.
Location of the photo: The photo was taken at the Little Haiti Cultural Center, where Biden posed with dancers standing behind him. This detail helps establish the context and further supports the veracity of the claim.
Lack of response from Biden: s campaign: The expert's verdict mentions that Biden's campaign did not respond to requests for comment regarding the photo. This absence of a response can be seen as an indirect confirmation of the photo's authenticity.
